Articles.Content:
I decided to make a series of short Twitch streams where I create a large space station. It will consist of:

-Central CnC Hub

-Fission reactor

-Large amounts of fuel for refueling STO's, VTOL's, and deep space missions

-Large Science station

-Sleeping/eating area (and a place to just chill)

-Large docking bay area for several ships

I actually decided to do this after I got my central part up into orbit already, so that's where the first one starts. It's not much in the way of a video but lets you see how the central point will look. Please give me tips if any on how to make my video's better (more enjoyable?). Unfortunately I can't make them higher quality otherwise it'll stutter terribly due to my internet. Voice also is out of the question (until I get a new mic anyway).

Any Idea's of how to extend the space station is also welcome!

Over all Plan:

Launch 1: Setup the central unit - Completed

Launch 2: Setup the Fission Reactor to power the base. - Completed

Launch 3: Setup the Large refueling tanks

Launch 4: Setup the Eating/Sleeping area

Launch 5: Extend the Eating/Sleeping area with a large research base extension

Launch 6: Setup the large docking bay area (may take several launches)

Launch 1:

(about 12 minutes long)

http://www.twitch.tv/ladyathena/b/528963105

Launch 2:

59:43 minutes long

Launch 2

Had difficulty meeting up with the station (hadn't done rendezvous in a long time). I used Mechjeb only to speed up the process for Twitch, I don't usually use it.

Edited May 16, 2014 by LadyAthena
